channel.title: Leanpub Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Interviews With Leanub Authors
channel.itunes:author: Leanpub
channel.itunes:summary: Peter Armstrong and Len Epp from Leanpub interview Leanpub authors about their careers, their books, and their experiences with the lean publishing process on Leanpub.
channel.description: In the Leanpub Podcast we talk to authors about their books and their careers. From startup founders to data scientists to software developers, our authors represent a wide array of interests and experiences. Check it out!

item.title: Leanpub Podcast #28: Phil Sturgeon
item.itunes:author: Len Epp
item.itunes:subtitle: An interview with Phil Sturgeon, Author of Build APIs You Won't Hate
item.itunes:summary: In this interview, Leanpub co-founder Len Epp chats with Phil Sturgeon, author of the Leanpub bestseller Build APIs You Won't Hate. In a wide-ranging discussion, Phil talks about his career, his various projects, and his experience writing and selling a bestselling book.

item.title: Leanpub Podcast #31: Antonio Leiva
item.itunes:author: Len Epp
item.itunes:subtitle: An interview with Antonio Leiva, Author of Kotlin for Android Developers
item.itunes:summary: In this interview, Leanpub co-founder Len Epp chats with Antonio Leiva, author of the Leanpub books Kotlin for Android Developers and 10 consejos para convertirte en un desarrollador experto. Antonio talks about his career, what the scene is like for software developers in Spain, and what it's like to self-publish an in-progress book.
